definition.name: Deploy Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Template
definition.description: Use this GitHub Action task to deploy Azure Resource Manager (ARM) template
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: scope
inputs.description: Provide the scope of the deployment. Valid values are: 'resourcegroup', 'tenant', 'managementgroup', 'subscription'

inputs.name: subscriptionId
inputs.description: Override the Subscription Id set by Azure Login.

inputs.name: managementGroupId
inputs.description: Specify the Id for the Management Group, only required for Management Group Deployments.

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: Provide the target region, only required for tenant, management Group or Subscription deployments.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.description: Provide the name of a resource group, only required for resource Group deployments.

inputs.name: template
inputs.description: Specify the path or URL to the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: deploymentMode
inputs.description: Incremental (only add resources to resource group) or Complete (remove extra resources from resource group) or Validate (only validates the template).

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.description: Specifies the name of the resource group deployment to create.

inputs.name: failOnStdErr
inputs.description: Specify whether to fail the action if some data is written to stderr stream of az cli. Valid values are: true, false

inputs.name: additionalArguments
inputs.description: Specify any additional arguments for the deployment.

inputs.name: maskedOutputs
inputs.description: Specify list of output keys that its value need to be register to github action as secret. (checkout https://github.com/actions/toolkit/issues/184#issuecomment-1198653452 for valid multiline string)
